ç»•è¿‡cloundflareå¯»æ‰¾çœŸå®IP

Running CF-Hero

The most basic running command. It checks A and TXT records by default.

or you can pass â€œfâ€ parameter to it.

Use the censys parameter to include Shodan in the scan

Use the shodan parameter to include Shodan in the scan

Use the securitytrails parameter to include Shodan in the scan

Use the -td and -dl parameters to attempt to find the target domainâ€™s IP address by utilizing a list of domains or subdomains that are not behind Cloudflare. By specifying the IP addresses in the blocks where you have identified live IP addresses used by the targetâ€™s cloud or on-premises infrastructure with the -dl parameter, you can find the real IP address of the target domain

to get domains behind of CF

to get domains not behind of CF

other options (custom ja3, proxy, worker, user agent)

create cf-hero.yaml file under $HOME/.config/ directory to set censys API key
